name: You Are Not Alone (Dashing Ashes)
description:
Job is easy:

  1. Fuel top and bottom thrusters
  2. Activate the pilot seat
  3. Repeat until at Final Destination
  4. Do die, because this way you can help yourself

Via the achievements of modern science this spaceship has a time resetting system. On every death time rewinds and you are reborn as your clone, doing your duties alongside yourself from the previous life. And also yourself from the life before that. And also from the life before that. Gosh! This place can get quite crowded!

Developed in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51.

Controls
  • Q - Reclone
  • E - Interact/Pick up object
  • Left Mouse - Shoot/Drop object
  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Aim
  • R - Reload
Credits

Leonid Dudakov (@DetectiveLosos) - Art, VFX, Lighting, Programming, Audio

Annie Owl (@owl_annie) - Art, Level Design, Programming
